meanings.definition: Having the most crinkles or wrinkles.
meanings.sent1: The crinkliest paper was carefully folded into a tiny boat.
meanings.sent2: She chose the crinkliest fabric for her craft project.
meanings.sent3: The crinkliest map led them on a wild goose chase.
meanings.sent4: His crinkliest smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The crinkliest leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is the most crinkly.
meanings.sent1: She smiled crinkliest when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent2: The old book pages turned crinkliest as he flipped through them.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred crinkliest when petted behind the ears.
meanings.sent4: The paper crinkliest under the weight of the heavy book.
meanings.sent5: The autumn leaves crinkliest under our feet as we walked in the park.
